description: This table contains product-specific administration instructions. This information is already contained as a part of the table ORD_MED_ADMININSTR so this table does not have to be extracted.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order (prescription) record. NOTE: This is an internal unique identifier for order (ORD) master file records in this table and cannot be used to link to CLARITY_MEDICATION.rd.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for each product-specific administration instruction line.

columns.name: MED_PROD_ADMN_INSTR
columns.description: Product-specific administration instructions converted to plain text. This item is automatically updated whenever the medication product changes for the given order, either through intelligent medication selection (IMS) for mixtures or by user action. It is automatically appended to item Administration instructions.

columns.name: ORDERING_DATE
columns.description: The date the order was placed in calendar format.
